jpen-2

Packages
jpen Main classes for JPen client applications and PenProviders.
jpen.demo Demo utilities.
jpen.demo.inspect Demo utility for runtime inspection.
jpen.event Event classes for JPen client applications.
jpen.internal Don't use this package or its subpackages directly, they contain various utilities for JPen internal use only and may change without notice.
jpen.internal.filter Filter to remove movement data from tablet devices in relative (mouse) mode.
jpen.owner PenOwner definition and various PenOwner implementations.
jpen.owner.awt Java AWT component PenOwner.
jpen.provider PenProvider utilities and various PenProvider implementations.
jpen.provider.osx Mac OS X tablet PenProvider.
jpen.provider.system Java AWT mouse PenProvider.
jpen.provider.wintab Windows Wintab tablet PenProvider.
jpen.provider.xinput Linux X Input tablet PenProvider.
